title: Coronation Street spoilers: Sinead forgives Daniel for his cheating in her dying hours
text:
Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) left wife Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) devastated during Coronation Street last night when he revealed that he’s kissed Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) earlier in the week. Tonight, Sinead continued to process the news, while also making final preparations before time runs out — something which ultimately allowed her to forgive Daniel.

During last night’s episode, Daniel couldn’t shake his guilty feelings, and he struggled to make eye contact with Sinead as a result of what he did.

While he deliberated over whether or not to tell his dying wife the truth, Sinead attempted to make a list of things she’d like to take with her to the hospice, but while doing so she stumbled upon Bethany’s notebook, and proceeded to read her short story.

Afterwards, Sinead became convinced that Bethany had feelings for Daniel, and thus she asked him if this was the case. Eventually, Daniel came clean about the kiss — leaving Sinead devastated. After being kicked out, Daniel proceeded to get drunk before collapsing by the canal.

Tonight — knowing that she doesn’t have much time left — Sinead decided to record special messages on Daniel’s laptop for Bertie, in an attempt to highlight just how much she loves him.

Daniel eventually showed up at the Barlow household, and as a result, Tracy (Kate Ford) paid Sinead a visit to let her know about her husband’s self-destructive actions. Tracy then reminded Sinead of how much Bertie needs his father.

Daniel later arrived up at the flat — and Sinead revealed that the worst thing is that she doesn’t have time to let this situation play out the natural way. In other words, she doesn’t have time for an argument, and thus she ultimately decided to forgive Daniel, before informing him that he now needs to forgive himself.

He promised that he’d always put Bertie first, and the couple embraced, before Sinead told her husband that he is — and always will be — her home.

Coronation Street continues Friday 25thOctober at 7:30pm.
